item.title: Random || Not Random # 360: Walk
item.description:
250 steps in 10 direction(s) chosen from 8 possible step size(s).

$$ s = .04183970, \; $$ $$ | \lbrace \theta \rbrace | = 10, $$ $$ | \lbrace r \rbrace | = 8,$$ $$ r_0 = 0.0000,$$ $$ R = 0.09, $$ $$r \sim \beta(1.000, 1.000), $$ $$\theta \sim \beta(1.000, 1.000). $$
